name: Jena 2.11.0
releaseNotes: Release Notes - Apache Jena - Version Jena 2.11.0

issues.title: Upgrade Lucene version to 2.9.3 and fix tests (if there are failures).
Cope with BOM in UTF-8 streams - old Jena readers
Cope with BOM in UTF-8 streams - RIOT readers
Add timeout mechanism to query execution
Check use of exception in QueryIterGroup / QueryIterSort .cancel()
Make cancellation immediate is called before execution starts
Remove LARQ from ARQ
UnsupportedPolymorphismException has implicit dependency on EnhNode
No web site at the Apache Incubator yet
ListIndividuals in OntModel incorrectly lists built-ins from RDFS when using RDFS reasoning
IndexLARQ is not thread safe
IRI isRootless flips true and false.
Turtle Files with a UTF-8 BOM fail to parse
Round trip problem with N3 and owl:SameAs
Clean up N3
javadoc and possibly code bug in com.hp.hpl.jena.ontology.impl.OntModelImpl.listStatements(Resource, Property, RDFNode, Model)

tdbloader2 dies on unrecognized file suffix
No -h support for rdfcopy

missing prefix in example doc for assembly

Wrong query result when FILTERing an unbound variable
Partial failure to see prefixes in persistent storage

NPE in BlockMgrCache in direct mode
SVN directories are included in Eclipse .classpath

extremely large buffer is being created in ObjectFileStorage
BufferingWriter.close() does not flush buffer before closing
journal.jrl is not released when expelling a alocation
transactional behavior not sound
TDB 0.9.0 snapshot sometimes returns a SELECT binding twice

Website must display disclaimer text

TxTDB problem during concurrent execution
SDB has JUnit as its runtime dependency: we should avoid that

xsd:anyURI is sameValueAs an xsd:string or simple literal

Resolve Maven warnings due to use of deprecated feature

schemagen script is missing from Jena 2.7.0 release

tdbloader2 shell script calls missing tdb_path

running eyeball tests fails

testing files not included in the test jar

Avoid a total sort for ORDER BY + LIMIT queries
